game.name: DCS: NS 430 Navigation System for Mi-8MTV2
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원
game.shortDescription: The NS 430 for the Mi-8MTV2 module integrates the NS 430 panel directly into the Mi-8MTV2 cockpit (not as a pop-up display). The NS 430 is fully wired into the electrical and radio systems of the Mi-8MTV2.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The NS 430 for the Mi-8MTV2 module integrates the NS 430 panel directly into the Mi-8MTV2 cockpit (not as a pop-up display). The NS 430 is fully wired into the electrical and radio systems of the Mi-8MTV2.
